Phi.Light
Class GlobeLight

java.lang.Object
  Phi.Light.Light
      Phi.Light.GlobeLight

public class GlobeLight
extends Light

Author:
mbranton Class: "GlobeLight" Author: Michael Branton Purpose: Extends the Light class so as to display a spherical globe surrounding the light source An emissive color must be specified for the globe. The diffuse color of the light is used as the diffuse color of the globe surface Created: October 2, 1999 Revised: Jul 09, 2004 to use JOGL
